exact_source: To retain the 51% beneficial interest COB must meet a minimum expenditure of A$500k by 30 June 2027; COB will then have the right (but not the obligation) to earn up to a 75% interest (an additional 24%) in the Project by incurring an additional A$1.5M expenditure on the tenements by 30 June 2028. (Total AUD 2.0M * 0.70 USD/AUD = USD 1,400,000).
